nodes.text: Fallon Pollo was a mercenary humanoid pilot active for 10 years, 2 months. Just after retiring in style, Pollo began working for the highest bidder again, unable to stop working because of the action. In 0 ABY, Pollo was hired by the assassin X-7 to hunt down Luke Skywalker on a team led by Lune Divinian. Pollo attacked Skywalker with the team in the atmosphere of the planet Kamino, but crashed his Preybird style ship in an old,and abandoned barracks. There was a wound in his leg, and while he was worrying about that, he was attacked by a creature made by Elo Panil. After being chased into an alley, Pollo was eaten by the creature.
